    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(org.jsfml.system.Time deltaT)
        Description copied from class: Scene
        Updates the game logic. To avoid copy-paste code, the abstract Scene class handles common events such as closing the game. For now we'll opt for a lazy switch solution. Hopefully it can be replaced with something more elegant later on.
        Overrides:
        update in class Scene

      • processInput

        public void processInput()
        Description copied from class: Scene
        Handles user input. Polls JSFML events and maps them into custom events. Update() uses these custom events to then perform the necessary actions.
        Specified by:
        processInput in class Scene
